fields.name: General
fields.value:
• End your round when you get the hero shard.
• Do not start a round if you cannot complete it in the worst-case senario (5100 gems for 9 flips).

fields.name: Best Strategy
fields.value:
• Have around 24,000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~8 rounds (and get **1** extra shard). The average shard cost is 2,390 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• Have around 62,000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~22 rounds (and get **3** extra shards). The average shard cost is 2,380 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
